keyword: how many calories in a blt sandwich
title: How Many Calories in a BLT Sandwich?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a BLT sandwich, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and easy tweaks for variations under 500 kcal.
h1: How Many Calories in a BLT Sandwich?
assumptions: Standard BLT: 2 slices white bread (70g total), 3 strips cooked bacon (15g), 1 leaf lettuce, 2 slices tomato (50g), 1 tbsp mayonnaise; untoasted.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, portion size, bread type, bacon thickness, and mayo amount. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard BLT sandwich contains about 450 kcal with 15 g protein and 25 g fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use whole wheat bread instead of white
Substitute turkey bacon for regular bacon

faqs.q: How many calories in a BLT sandwich with mayo?
faqs.a: About 450 kcal for a standard version with 1 tbsp mayo.

faqs.q: What are the macros in a BLT sandwich?
faqs.a: Roughly 40 g carbs, 15 g protein, 25 g fat, and 3 g fiber.

faqs.q: Does toasting the BLT change calories?
faqs.a: No significant change unless butter is added, which adds ~50 kcal.

faqs.q: How to make a lower-calorie BLT sandwich?
faqs.a: Use low-fat mayo, turkey bacon, and whole grain bread to drop to ~350 kcal.

faqs.q: Is sodium high in a BLT sandwich?
faqs.a: Yes, around 900 mg mainly from bacon and bread; opt for low-sodium versions.
